channel.title: Stackable Bolts, Rune C'Bow?
channel.description:
Hey, I realised that runite bolts arnt stackable :( I changed them so they take up the arrow slot but it says that there are no arrows. I would like this to be changed so that only bolts can be used with Rune C'bow and to make them stackable.
If anybody knows how i could do this then that would be great ! and how do i set the flight of the arrows animation? Thanks if you can help me ! :D
